project.name: MapComplete Maxspeed
project.description: This map shows the legally allowed maximum speed on every road.

tags.description: The MapComplete theme Maxspeed has a layer Maxspeed showing features with this tag

The MapComplete theme Maxspeed has a layer Maxspeed showing features with this tag
Layer 'Maxspeed' shows and asks freeform values for key 'maxspeed' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Maxspeed')

Layer 'Maxspeed' shows highway=living_street with a fixed text, namely 'This is a living street, which has a maxspeed of 20km/h' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Maxspeed')
